doc:
Richard Dix https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Dix 0 Richard Dix (born Ernst Carlton Brimmer; July 18, 1893 – September 20, 1949) was an American motion picture actor who achieved popularity in both silent and sound film. His standard on-screen image was that of the rugged and stalwart hero. He was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actor for his lead role in the Best Picture-winning epic, Cimarron (1931). Richard_Dix ( born Ernst_Carlton_Brimmer ; July_18_,_1893 – September_20_,_1949 ) was an_American_motion_picture_actor who achieved_popularity in both silent_and_sound_film . His_standard_on-screen_image was that of the_rugged_and_stalwart_hero . He was_nominated for the_Academy_Award for_Best_Actor for his_lead_role in the_Best_Picture-winning_epic , Cimarron_(_1931_) .
